serverUrl.label: Server URL
serverUrl.help: Base URL of the agent-memory-server (or use ${AGENT_MEMORY_SERVER_URL})

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: API key for authentication (optional, or use ${AGENT_MEMORY_API_KEY})

namespace.label: Namespace
namespace.help: Namespace for organizing memories (isolates memories by project/app)

userId.label: User ID
userId.help: User ID for memory isolation (each user gets their own memories)

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context

minScore.label: Minimum Score
minScore.help: Minimum similarity score for memory recall (0-1)

recallLimit.label: Recall Limit
recallLimit.help: Maximum number of memories to recall

extractionStrategy.label: Extraction Strategy
extractionStrategy.help: How to extract memories: discrete (semantic/episodic), summary, preferences, or custom

customPrompt.label: Custom Extraction Prompt
customPrompt.placeholder: Extract action items and decisions from this conversation.
customPrompt.help: Custom prompt for memory extraction (only used with 'custom' strategy)

summaryViewName.label: Summary View Name
summaryViewName.help: Name for the rolling summary view of long-term memories

summaryTimeWindowDays.label: Summary Time Window (days)
summaryTimeWindowDays.help: Rolling window in days for the summary view (only recent memories included)

summaryGroupBy.label: Summary Group By
summaryGroupBy.help: Fields to partition summaries by: user_id, namespace, or both

recallDescription.label: Recall Tool Description
recallDescription.placeholder: Search through long-term memories. Use when you need context about user preferences, past decisions, or previously discussed topics.
recallDescription.help: Description shown to the LLM for the memory_recall tool

storeDescription.label: Store Tool Description
storeDescription.placeholder: Save important information in long-term memory. Use for preferences, facts, decisions.
storeDescription.help: Description shown to the LLM for the memory_store tool

forgetDescription.label: Forget Tool Description
forgetDescription.help: Description shown to the LLM for the memory_forget tool
